name: Cardiologist
info: A specialist in the diagnosis and treatment of heart and cardiovascular system.

name: Dermatologist
info: A medical specialist who diagnoses and treats conditions related to skin, hair, and nails.

name: Endocrinologist
info: A medical specialist who focuses on identifying and managing hormonal disorders and imbalances in endocrine glands.

name: Gynecologist
info: A medical doctor who specializes in the health of the female reproductive system, including the uterus, ovaries, and vagina.

name: Neurologist
info: A medical specialist who diagnoses and treats disorders related to the nervous system, including the brain, spinal cord, and nerves.

name: Oncologist
info: A specialist in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer, including the use of chemotherapy, radiation therapy, etc.

name: Pediatrician
info: A medical doctor who specializes in the health and medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.

name: Psychiatrist
info: A medical doctor who specializes in the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of mental illnesses and emotional disorders.

name: Radiologist
info: A medical specialist who interprets the medical images, such as X-rays, CT scans, MRI scans, and ultrasounds.

name: Surgeon
info: A specialist in performing surgical procedures to treat injuries, diseases, and deformities through invasive methods
